Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Render/render

Function
  1. void render(Figure fig)
  2. void render(str name, Figure fig)
Description Renders figure fig on a canvas. Inside Eclipse a new tabbed pane is created. Used from the command line, a new window is created.

When name is given, it is shown on the tab of the pane and in the window title.
Pitfalls On Mac OS X, render only works inside Eclipse.
